snippet: During the Lakers’ win at New Orleans, Kobe Bryant, 34, became the youngest player in N.B.A. history to eclipse 30,000 career points.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Los Angeles Lakers guard Kobe Bryant scores 29 points in 103-87 win over New Orleans Hornets, becoming fifth player in NBA history to eclipse 30,000 career points; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: During the Lakers’ win at New Orleans, Kobe Bryant, 34, became the youngest player in N.B.A. history to eclipse 30,000 career points.

headline.seo: Lakers’ Kobe Bryant Becomes Youngest With 30,000 Points
